Articles.Content:
Coincidence

On Year 1, Day 5 near sunrise, I found:

Is it Minmus? It looked fairly lined up on the map...

Then I got in my plane and flew the opposite direction. I found this:

Wow.

This is my first post so sorry if i didn't include anything.

Welcome to forums!

Yes, what you have seen is Minmus and a solar eclipse. Eclipses are common on Kerbin as Mun is in exactly the same orbital plane as Kerbin around Sun so there is a full solar eclipse every time Mun passes around Sun. But the sight sure is beautiful.
